item.title: Player equipped item
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

I was bored, so I added my own version of woodcutting.

case 1308: if (playerLevel[8] >= 30) if ((playerHasItem(1351)) || (playerHasItem(1349)) || (playerHasItem(1353)) || (playerHasItem(1355)) || (playerHasItem(1357)) || (playerHasItem(1359))) { setAnimation(875); addItem(1519, 1); addSkillXP(3000, 8); sendMessage("You get some willow logs."); actionTimer = 100; actionTimer =- playerLevel[8]; } else { sendMessage("You need an axe and 30 woodcutting to cut this tree!"); sendMessage("Try ::axeplz"); } break;
How do I make it so you have to have the axe equipped?

Read full topic
